programme.title: Jiwa Ketar Ketir Melihat Mas Bodyguard
programme.desc: Sebagai pengawal peribadi, Elang perlu sentiasa berada di samping Dea sama ada menghantar ke kampus atau mengiringinya semasa berada di kampus. Menjadi pengawal peribadi ternyata mempunyai banyak halangan termasuklah berdepan dengan kawan-kawan Dea yang ingin memisahkannya. Apatah lagi, berhadapan dengan penculik yang selama ini menyasarkan Dea.

programme.title: Take Point

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with a blind telemarketer and realizing her blindness was his fault, a former boxer decides to fight in an underground fighting contest to earn money for her surgery.

programme.title: Rampant
programme.desc: Returning from imprisonment abroad, a prince and his fellow countrymen band together to battle bloodthirsty demons in ancient Korea.

programme.title: The Berlin File
programme.desc: A North Korean agent in Berlin is betrayed and cut loose when a weapons deal is exposed. He tries to escape being purged, while being pursued by a North and South Korean operative.

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. A veteran cop and his special task force are assigned on the case, however, the kidnapper catches wind of the police involvement…

programme.title: Love, Lies
programme.desc: A gisaeng is consumed by jealousy after her friend finds success as a pop singer and her lover falls for her. Feeling betrayed, things begin to fall apart as she tries to regain the things she lost.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: For The Emperor
programme.desc: Former baseball player involved in fixing game was recruited to work for private loan company. He also falls for bar owner Yeon-Soo, and slowly unleashes his endless desire and ambition...

programme.title: Confession Of Murder

programme.title: The Scam
programme.desc: Hyeon-Soo joins an elite team formed by a gangster-turned-investor who attempt their biggest scam to swindle $60,000,000 from the stock market.

programme.title: The Wicked
programme.desc: Sae Young is the new hire at a small office treated harshly by her manager. After picking on Sae Young in her backhanded ways, she soon finds herself the target of Sae Young's wicked ways.

programme.title: Samjin Company English Class

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3346
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44934494
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep803804
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1758
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44944495
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1954
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3499
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2499
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep368
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep805806
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44944495
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44954496

Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1955
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Wednesday (M) Ep368
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: The former SWAT captain, Dong Gu, suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster…

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. She meets a Chinese immigrant man working as a driver there, and as she starts to learn more about him, her life begins to change.

programme.title: Paws-Men
programme.desc: When a dog is in need of rescue, the Paws-Men assemble to save the dog like Batman. “Paws-Men” tells the story of four men rescuing dogs and the many difficulties that they encounter, from a dog eatery to bullies and a dog abusing granny. Despite the hardships, Paws-Men give us a peek into the true friendships between dogs and humans.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 3
programme.desc: After the events in Bangkok and New York, Tang Ren and Qin Feng are invited to solve a murder case in Tokyo, but it turns out to be a challenge for the world’s best detectives. While the case has become complicated and confusing since the world’s top detective got involved, a hilarious challenge for the best detectives in Asia has just begun…

programme.title: First Love the Litter on the Breeze
programme.desc: This movie is the directorial debut of actor Eric Kot for Wong Kar Wai. Eric features the topic of first love in his first movie: a sleepwalker guided through the night by a lonely admirer is bizarre yet romantic, while a married grocer facing the vengeful first love that he once rejected is heartbreaking.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chef’s delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the “Gang of Five” in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong’s toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Cloud’s successor as the city’s guard.

programme.title: 77 Heartbreaks
programme.desc: Adam is upset after breaking up with Eva and has a drunken tryst with Mandy. He discovers Eva’s diary which recorded her 77 heartbreaking experiences with him. Adam finally realizes Eva is his true love and they resolve to start anew. However, when Eva stumbles across evidence of his affair with Mandy, will she be able to pardon him a 78th time?

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five old friends revisit their school before it closes down to find records of paranormal existence, including the mysterious case of a missing student. The school was previously occupied by the Japanese for various “human experiments” and is known to be haunted. Can the five friends get out of the school safely?

programme.title: Knockout
programme.desc: A former boxing champion and convict who has just been released from prison discovers that his wife has died and he is now a single parent. The situation is made worse with his daughter’s diagnosis of leukaemia. In order to encourage his daughter and fulfil his promise of never giving up, he re-enters the boxing ring.

programme.title: Zu:WarriorsFrom Magic Mountain
programme.desc: A classic fantasy action movie about the epic battles between celestial swordsmen and the Evil Force. Set on the mythical Zu mountain range, a mysterious land where ordinary men dare not venture, the legend has it that skilful swordsmen protect civilians by fending off evil. Featuring Sammo Hung, Yuen Biao and Adam Cheng and directed by Tsui Hark.

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: Following the outbreak of a virus that wipes out the majority of the human population, a young woman documents her family's new life in quarantine and tries to protect her infected sister.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Driving Miss Wealthy
programme.desc: To teach his irresponsible daughter Jennifer some respect, her billionaire father pretends to disown her. He then hires Mario to pretend to be her driver and protect her. Just as the two start falling for each other, Jennifer’s father becomes very ill and she must take over his business. Will Jennifer and Mario’s budding romance continue?

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The “passion choir pilot program” trains students from three underperforming schools’ choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the “passion choir” and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: The Way Of The Dragon
programme.desc: A young Hong Kong man, Tang Lung arrives at Rome to help a friend of his family, a girl called Chen Ching-hua. She has been threatened by local gangsters who want to takeover her restaurant. Soon after Tang's arrival, the gangsters appear at the restaurant and force Chen to sign over the deed. They laugh at the Chinese style of fighting. Angry Tang challenges and defeats them in an excellent show of his fighting skills. The mastermind of the gang orders Tang's assassination. When this fails, the gang leader hires an international Karate champion form the United States in a last attempt to kill Tang. Tang meets the American in a coliseum and they fight like gladiators to the death.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang’s first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt’s puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: Wallace, an old gang member, is tasked to kill the son of a mob boss, Robert. Gathering his team for the job, the six of them set out to hunt Robert down. However, when the mission goes horribly wrong, Wallace later finds out that it was all a set-up to flush out a mole in his team…

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her father’s restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Zombiology: Enjoy Yourself Tonight
programme.desc: Two eccentric young men deem themselves as heroes who can save the earth. While they feel frustrated in real life, a zombie from their favourite animation suddenly appears in Hong Kong, turning people into zombies and causing widespread chaos, the young men decide to take on the responsibility and fight the battle against the zombies!

programme.title: Paradox
programme.desc: Hong Kong Police officer Li travels to Thailand to search for his daughter when she disappears mysteriously. He teams up with a local detective to investigate and they chance upon a black market organ smuggling ring which could throw light on his daughter’s whereabouts...

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: After several years of marriage, Prof. Wu Te-sheng (Alex Man Chi-leung) and his wife Wan Chun (Patricia Ha Man-jik) decide to have children. Then a medical examination shows Wu is the cause of the couple's infertility, and Wu reluctantly adopts his doctor's advice to have his wife artificially inseminated in Hawaii.

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung’s house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung’s mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: The subtle repackage of the most filmed Ching Dynasty novel, The Dream Of The Red Chamber by renowned director Li Han-hsiang has earned public acclaim by attaining The Best Art Direction of The 15th Golden Horse Award, The Best Costume and The Best Art Direction Of The 24th Asian Film Festival. Brigitte Lin and Sylvia Chang play the adorable yet sorrowful couple Bao Yu and Dai Yu; playing their roles to the hilt in this gloomy love story of their uncontrollable destinies.

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Murderer Pursues
programme.desc: Wang Chung was a valued actor long before he became a director, but as a filmmaker, he helped create some of the most interesting thrillers Shaw Brothers ever released - including this fascinating crime saga of a Sino-Vietnamese crime gang. Danny Lee stars as a misunderstood refugee while Ray Lui plays a cop struggling against his own conscience to ensure that justice is upheld.

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Sweet young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu's fiery attitude gets her locked away in a dungeon. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Song Of Orchid Island
programme.desc: Dr. He moves to the remote Lanyu island off the coast of Taiwan to look for his long lost father, and starts to run a clinic curing islanders who are bitten by the fatal red worms there. He meets Ya Lan who works as a nurse in his clinic and falls in love with him. Things get vicious for Dr. He as a jealous islander plots to get rid of him…

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up - will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: Forbidden love and magical weapons are at the centre of this enjoyable martial arts comedy. A reunited couple must recover the titular swords and avenge a murder from their past!

programme.title: Police Force
programme.desc: A man joins the Hong Kong police force to track down a murderer who has killed his friend in a robbery. While he struggles to reconcile his law defending police duty with his desire for vengeance, he also has a new-found respect for the law.

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: Love triangles or quadrangles rule, as a group of young people get entangled in a web of love and emotions. Director Doe Chin, renowned for his dramas and musicals, knows just how to tug at the heartstrings.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Danger has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: Les Belles
programme.desc: Acknowledged as one of the greatest Hong Kong musicals, this lavish movie starring Linda Lin, who won Best Actress for her performance, infuses its wispy plot with style and wit, and the results are pure pleasure.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of ‘scaffolding kung fu”.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin’s husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tian’s rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tian’s granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Fresh from his smashing directorial debut comedy Let's Make Laugh, Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre 2
programme.desc: Only by bringing together the powerful Heaven Sword and the mighty Dragon Sabre can six martial arts sects struggling for supremacy be saved in this thrilling sequel to Chu Yuan's original hit.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This colourful, complex saga is packed with conspiracies, schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres on the struggle for underworld supremacy between the Longmen and Roc clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut or obvious.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Challenge of the Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, the same martial arts teacher of his father. Although he is defeated in the competition, Wong Fei Hung’s passion in Kung Fu finally allows him to become Lu’s disciple.

programme.title: Run Raja Run
programme.desc: A cheated police officer who has been involved in a scam by his co-officer, goes to jail. His son seeks revenge with an extremely thrilling plan along with his friend.

programme.title: Kabadadhari
programme.desc: A passionate traffic police who is bored of his routine job stumbles across some skeletons which ignite his soulless life. When he probes into the case he comes across a cop who had investigated the case in the past.

programme.title: Kolamaavu Kokila
programme.desc: Kokila, who has financial issues, gets involved in a drug racket to earn quick money. Eventually, her family also gets dragged in the internal drug war which, in turn, puts their lives at risk.

programme.title: Bow Bow
programme.desc: Sanju, a little boy, adopts different methods to train his lazy dog. His world, however, comes crashing down when he loses the dog.

programme.title: Rekka
programme.desc: Shiva, who is known for helping couples elope, is forced to kidnap a politician's daughter by a gangster, David, after he stops his wedding to a girl who did not want to marry him.

programme.title: Ismart Shankar
programme.desc: Shankar, a contract killer, manages to escape after murdering a politician. Later, he helps the police find a murderer when an officer's memory is transferred to him.

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: The home minister requests Ravi to impersonate the deceased ACP Baldev, his lookalike, to catch Ganguly, a dreaded gangster. After taking over his new role, Ravi finds many startling revelations.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Enna Solla Pogirai
programme.desc: Vikram, a young man, plans to make his fiancee fall in love with him. However, when his plan backfires, he finds himself embroiled in a love triangle.

programme.title: Vidhi Madhi Ulta
programme.desc: Aadhi has a nightmare where the girl he loves and his family is murdered by a gangster. However, he soon realises that everything around him is starting to take the shape of his nightmare.

programme.title: Arumugam
programme.desc: Due to his hard work, Arumugam, a helpful poor man, becomes the richest man in his town. He sets out to exact revenge on Malini, a tycoon, for bulldozing his mother's grave and humiliating his sister.

programme.title: Tripura
programme.desc: Village girl who has weird dreams and all those dreams come true.She one day dreams that she will kill her Husband.

programme.title: Kennedy Club
programme.desc: Savarimuthu, an ex-soldier, falls sick while training the women's kabaddi team of his village. Soon, a former student named Muruganandham is chosen to take his place.

programme.title: Mohini
programme.desc: Vaishnavi and Sandeep, a couple, are engaged to be married soon. However, things spiral out of control when she get possessed by her dead lookalike, who thirsts for revenge against Sandeep.

programme.title: Madhayaanai Koottam
programme.desc: Parthiban, the son of a powerful late patriarch, accidentally kills the son of Veera Thevar, while trying to save his stepbrother. Veera then decides to avenge his son's death by murdering Parthiban.

programme.title: Malaysia To Amnesia
programme.desc: Malaysia To Amnesia revolves around two childhood friends who plan to get married. However, they face complications as they are unable to cope with married life.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Irandam Ulagaporin
programme.desc: A lorry driver ends up in possession of an unexploded bomb that is being sought after by both the cops and pro-peace activists.

programme.title: Pournami Alaigal
programme.desc: Rajesh, a junior lawyer, marries Radha, the daughter of a famous lawyer. He feels ignored due to her closeness with her father and to get back at them, he takes up a high-profile murder case.

programme.title: Bhale Khilladi
programme.desc: An amnesiac scientist is in love with a woman who is unaware of his condition. Things take a turn when he has to convince her parents to agree to them getting married.

programme.title: Ezhumin
programme.desc: A group of children proficient in martial arts are kidnapped by thugs who have been sent to prevent them from taking part in an event. However, the children escape using their skills.

programme.title: En Peyar Surya En Veedu India
programme.desc: Following two violent incidents at a club and a police station, a short tempered soldier is challenged to give up anger if he wants to fulfill his dream of serving at the borders.

programme.title: Yevadu
programme.desc: Satya gets a different face after he is almost killed, but a new face multiplies his problems. His ordeal begins when he leaves the hospital and has to deal with his lover's murderer.

programme.title: Khooni Jung
programme.desc: Shiv Kashi's father puts their family name in jeopardy through nasty tactics. When Shiv finds out about his crimes, he struggles to restore his family's honour.

programme.title: U Me Aur Hum
programme.desc: While on a cruise, Dr Ajay Mehra falls in love with Piya and soon marries her. They lead a harmonious life until Piya gets pregnant and is soon diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease.

programme.title: Drona
programme.desc: Aditya is an orphaned and lonely young man. He soon learns that he belongs to a family of ancestral warriors who guard a mystic source of cosmic energy, and he must now take up his responsibilities.

programme.title: Phir Hera Pheri
programme.desc: The lives of Raju, Shyam and Baburao change completely when they get cheated by a fraudster. Now, they must find another way to repay the loan they took from a dreaded gangster.

programme.title: Phir Hera Pheri
programme.desc: The lives of Raju, Shyam and Baburao change completely when they get cheated by a fraudster. Now, they must find another way to repay the loan they took from a dreaded gangster.

programme.title: Trikon Ka Chauta Kon
programme.desc: Prakash, a married man, has an extramarital affair with Manisha and does not want the relationship to end while also hoping to stay married to his wife, Anuradha.

programme.title: Asoka
programme.desc: Asoka, the heir to the Maurya Empire, is sent on an exile for having fought with his half-brother, Susima. While travelling south, he meets Kaurwaki, princess of Kalinga, and falls for her.

programme.title: Gabbar Is Back
programme.desc: The city's administration wrongs Aditya, a commoner. To avenge his tragedy, he disguises himself as a vigilante, Gabbar, and teams up with honest government officers to expose the corrupt.

programme.title: Department
programme.desc: Inspector Mahadev Bhosale recruits Shiv Narayan, a suspended brave police officer, to form a hit squad. Soon after Shiv joins the gangster-turned-minister Sarjerao Gaikwad, Mahadev and Shiv turn foes.

programme.title: Ungli
programme.desc: A street-smart policeman tries to catch a gang of social vigilantes who adopt unconventional means to unmask corrupt people. Soon, he himself becomes a member of the gang.

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: After her family forces her to get married, Kavya runs away from her house. When her brother goes in search of her, he finds her with a young man and assumes him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: One By Two
programme.desc: Amit struggles with a mundane life and a recent breakup, while Samara, an aspiring dancer, tries to win a reality show. After several accidental escapes, the strangers' paths finally cross.

programme.title: Lekar Hum Deewana Dil
programme.desc: Dino and Karishma get married in Goa and head to the lesser-known parts of the country, afraid of being caught by their parents. However, they start facing multiple challenges in their marital life.

programme.title: Aladin
programme.desc: A young orphan, Aladin, who gets bullied by his peers, finds a magic lamp that changes his life. Thereafter, he sets off on a series of adventures and uses the lamp to defeat the evil Ringmaster.

programme.title: Aladin
programme.desc: A young orphan, Aladin, who gets bullied by his peers, finds a magic lamp that changes his life. Thereafter, he sets off on a series of adventures and uses the lamp to defeat the evil Ringmaster.

programme.title: Awara Paagal Deewana
programme.desc: Dr Anmol, a dentist and henpecked husband, lives a miserable existence in New York due to his domineering wife. However, his troubles increase when he unwittingly gets embroiled in a mafia rivalry.

programme.title: Kunwara
programme.desc: Raju and Urmila meet in New Zealand and fall in love. However, when Raju helps a pregnant woman with a jilted lover, he ends up sabotaging his love life.

programme.title: R... Rajkumar
programme.desc: Romeo, a ruffian, starts working for Shivraj, a drug lord, and they end up falling for the same girl, Chanda. Soon, a fight between the two ensues to win her over.

programme.title: Mary Kom
programme.desc: When Mary Kom encounters a renowned coach in a boxing gym, she shares her boxing aspirations with him and convinces him to teach her. Despite her father's disapproval, she follows her passion.

programme.title: Aatank Ki Jung
programme.desc: Meenakshi wants Zareen to help her take action against an ad agency owner, Gowtham. However, due to a turn of events, Meenakshi and Gowtham get intel on a terrorist attack and have to stop it.

programme.title: Hey Ram
programme.desc: When his wife, Aparna, gets raped during the partition of India, Saketh Ram joins a gang that aims to kill Mahatma Gandhi because he advocates peace with Muslims.

programme.title: Real Winner
programme.desc: Frustrated with Shakti's rebellious nature, his parents send him to stay at his grandparents' house where he falls in love with Neelima. But he is shocked to learn that her marriage is already fixed.

programme.title: Saajan
programme.desc: Brothers Aman and Akash fall in love with Pooja. While both of them are willing to sacrifice their love for each other's sake, Pooja must make her decision.

programme.title: De Dana Dan
programme.desc: Two penniless friends are in desperate need of money in order to marry their respective girlfriends. In their attempts to make quick money, they kidnap a rich woman's pet and demand a hefty ransom.

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A cyborg is sent from the future to assassinate a young woman who's destined to give birth to a son who will become the key to saving humanity.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: One Christmas Eve a long time ago, a baby crawled into Santa's bag of toys... Raised as an elf, Buddy (Will Ferrell) grows into an adult three times larger than the biggest elf--and realizes that he will never truly fit in at the North Pole. This holiday season, Buddy goes looking for his true place in the world--in New York City.

programme.title: The Champ
programme.desc: Billy Flynn, who used to be a champion boxer, barely earns enough money to keep himself and his boy alive when his ex-wife, Annie returns. She has remarried and become successful and she wants custody of their child. Now to keep the son who adores him, Flynn must train, fight and find it within himself to once again become The Champ.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: To rescue his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and battle an old enemy . . . and rediscover the child in himself.

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: The personal assistant and Cinderella sister of a spoiled movie star finds herself in the middle of a behind the scenes Hollywood soap opera.

programme.title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side

programme.title: Arthur

programme.title: Gone With The Wind
programme.desc: On the eve of the United States Civil War, rich, beautiful and self-centered Scarlett O'Hara (Leigh) has everything she could want—except Ashley Wilkes (Leslie Howard). But as the war devastates the South, Scarlett discovers the strength within herself to protect her family and rebuild her life. Through everything, she longs for Ashley, unaware that she is already married to the man she really loves (Gable)—and who truly loves her—until she finally drives him away. Only then does Scarlett realize what she has lost … and decide to win him back.

programme.desc: Holly, a go-getter real estate executive from New York City who heads on assignment to a small town to buy up the quaint Clüsterfünke Inn and transform it into a megaresortcompetition.

programme.title: My Beautiful Country
programme.desc: Kosovo, 1999. The young Serbian widow Danica gives refuge to an injured Albanian soldier despite knowing that it would endanger her family. A love, one that defies ethnic antagonism and embodies resilience, blossoms between them like a flower in a drought.

programme.title: We Look The Same
programme.desc: In this witty short about racial and culture crises, a French-born Chinese store assistant is faced with a conundrum. A Chinese tourist needs to use the store’s restroom but that’s against the rules. Is compassion worth the risk of losing one’s job?

programme.title: Joy of Fatherhood
programme.desc: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: Hostage in Manila

programme.title: Girl In Flight
programme.desc: 11-year-old Silvia decides to fulfill her dream of visiting Rome by running away from home. She befriends Emina, a Roma girl, on the train ride there, and embarks on an adventure with her through the city to her gypsy camp.

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Married couple, Luca and Susi, are facing problems at work and they struggle to support their family of four. When Mary, their new au pair arrives, her presence lights up the dull household and her beauty captivates the lovestruck Luca and his son.

programme.title: The Blind Detective: The Fire Devil Of Vienna
programme.desc: The charred remains of the principal of a boarding school is found. Blind ex-cop Haller goes undercover to infiltrate the community and tries to discover its dark secrets. To make things more complicated, he unexpectedly falls for his beautiful co-worker.

programme.title: Love Suddenly
programme.desc: Still hung up on his teenage sweetheart Marie, Jakob sets out to win her back. However, she is under the mistaken impression that he is more successful than he actually is. Soon, Jakob finds himself in a web of lies he cannot escape from.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas – jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.desc: Pilot - Douglas “Doogie” Howser is a boy genius. Suffering from acute leukemia, Doogie shows an incredible deftness for medicine, compassion, and knowledge; he is a doctor in every sense of the word.

programme.title: Charmed S6 Ep02
programme.desc: Valhalley of the Dolls Part II - Phoebe and Paige search for Leo after Paige accidentally causes a "chipper" Piper to have amnesia, but the sisters soon learn he is being held on the mythical Island of Valhalla.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep08
programme.desc: When The Fat Lady Sings - Jessica becomes involved in a double-murder investigation when she attends an opera opening with old friend Dennis Stanton (Keith Michell) in San Francisco.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep03
programme.desc: Stolen - When a baby is stolen from her mother in a grocery store, Detectives Benson and Stabler soon discover that the kidnapping is only the tip of the iceberg in a baby snatching-and-selling scheme.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S3 Ep04
programme.desc: Rooftop - When a series of increasingly violent rapes occurs in an African-American community, Detectives Bensonand Stabler are quick to suspect a known sex-offender recently released from prison.

programme.title: Fawlty Towers S1 Ep02
programme.desc: The Builders - Sybil has picked a professional firm to make structural alterations to the hotel. But Basil prefers O'Reilly, the cowboy outfit who can do it on the cheap…

programme.title: Airwolf S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Shadow Of The Hawke - Part II - Michael Archangel, a CIA project director, enlists Vietnam veteran Stringfellow Hawke and Dominic Santini to recover Airwolf, a state-of-the-art helicopter which is a tool in the Mid-Eastern struggle.

programme.title: Doogie Howser, M.D. S1 Ep01

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep06
programme.desc: The Kissing Bandit/ The Witness/ Mike And Ike - A shy guy (Billy Crystal) dons a mask and goes around kissing every girl on the ship. Then, he meets a girl (Laurie Walters) with whom he connects. A couple (Marilyn McCoo and Billy Davis Jr.), who are Isaac's (Ted Lange) friends and with whom they performed on the streets in their youth, are now successful and rich and have a young son (Todd Bridges). But, his father spends more time on work than with his son. And, a woman (Toni Tennille) follows a man (Robert Reed), whom she knows witnessed what happened to someone she cares about and urges him to come forward and tell what he saw.

programme.desc: Father Knows Last - Carla surprises everyone when she announces who her baby's father is.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep09
programme.desc: Mr. & Mrs. Who - Charles returns from his leave; much to his surprise, the next day a woman appears at the 4077th claiming to be his wife. Charles seems to have had a lot to drink on his leave and doesn’t remember anything that happened. Meanwhile, B.J and Potter decide to try a new treatment, which unfortunately for them violates an I-Corps directive. Luckily for Charles, the new Mrs. Winchester confesses that she made the whole thing up and they aren’t actually married but she does fill him in on the details of their wild time in Tokyo. B.J. and Potter have a lot of explaining to do when Corporal Shaw from I-Corps pays them a visit.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep10
programme.desc: The Yalu Brick Road - A Thanksgiving Day feast turns ugly when the entire 4077th contracts food poisoning from the turkey Klinger found for the meal. Hawkeye and B.J. rush out to find much needed antibiotics for the unit and become horribly lost on the way, wrecking their jeep and wandering the countryside until they are rescued by a very peculiar North Korean soldier who leads them home.

programme.desc: Ship Of Ghouls - The Amazing Alonzo (Vincent Price) performs illusions for his adoring fans (Jane Kean, Iris Adrian and Bibi Osterwald) while neglecting his fiancé (Joan Blondell). A boy (Charlie Aiken) and his friend tell lies to the crew to get attention, while his parents (Gary Collins and Mary Ann Mobley) are not aware of his mischief. programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep11
programme.desc: Life Time - B.J. must battle both the clock and his conscience when a soldier may be permanently paralyzed unless he relieves an aortal replacement within twenty minutes and the only donor candidate is B.J.’s own patient, a soldier who has no brain function but is still hanging on. Although all of the medical staff agree with B.J. that his patient has no hope for recovery as the brain damage is permanent, the soldier’s best friend is also amongst the wounded and makes a plea for his friend that B.J. finds hard to ignore. Finally, the young G.I. understands that his friend is gone and his sacrifice will save the life of another man. For B.J. it is more than just another donor and he turns to his friends for support.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep12
programme.desc: Dear Uncle Abdul - Klinger’s new position as company clerk gives him new insight into the inner workings of the 4077th, and he makes several attempts to write to his Uncle Abdul back in Toledo while also trying to adjust to the demands of his new job. Klinger’s narration of a slice of life at the 4077th reveals the humor of camp life from Klinger’s perspective. Day-to-day 4077th humor topped off with the description of Hawkeye and B.J. competing to be the funniest man at M*A*S*H gives Klinger’s Uncle Abdul a letter worth waiting for.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep176
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep7
programme.desc: Food Factory celebrates Thanksgiving with mountains of stuffing, gluten-free pumpkin pie, turkey-shaped treats, and farm-fresh cranberry sauce.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Food Factory gears up for the best fiesta ever with chili and cheese tamales, tequila margaritas, guacamole-flavoured Guacachips, and citrus and cinnamon flavoured Mexican wedding cookies.

programme.title: Earth from Space S1 Ep1
programme.desc: A New Perspective - From space, we follow elephants struggling through drought, reveal unknown penguin colonies from the colour of their faeces, and discover strange ice rings that could endanger seals.

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Argentina - Joel and Nish spend a week in the tough, no-nonsense world of the Argentinian Gauchos, learning how to ride horse and herd cattle across the South American Pampas.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superfactories S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Revealing the inner workings of UPS, delivering to the world Brompton bicycles, Rold locking washing machines, and Nongshim instant noodles.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Great Lakes - Robson Green heads to exotic world locations to challenge locals at catching some of the strangest fish. In this episode he heads to the Great Lakes.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat’s strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - Life in the Furnace Ep2
programme.desc: It’s October in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley. The hottest and harshest time of year. But this year dry season conditions are exacerbated by a global El Niño event… the Valley is in the throes of drought. There’s been no rain since April and desperate animals are drawn to the only remaining source of water in the Valley – the dwindling Luangwa River. The last remaining deep pools are inhabited by hippos – hundreds squashed together in the only water deep enough to submerge them. As tempers flare and skirmishes break out, it’s a dangerous place for baby hippos, dwarfed by the three-tonne adults.

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - The Wild Web Ep7
programme.desc: In Zambia, no single creature survives in isolation. From lions and leopards to jumping spiders and bee-eating mantises, study the diverse network of animals and plants that makes the Luangwa Valley one of the most magical wildernesses in Africa.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Hippo Lagoon Ep1
programme.desc: Secluded and sheltered, away from the hustle and bustle of Zambia’s Luangwa River, Kasikizi lagoon is home to a small community of diverse wildlife. At the height of the wet season, it’s full to the brim with water – a peaceful spot, ideal for two old male hippos who wallow in its watery depths. The lagoon is their sanctuary, a world away from the more violent life they’ve left behind at the main river, where they had to face aggressive beachmasters, willing to fight to protect their territory...

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Stinkers Ep1
programme.desc: In nature, the right stench can mean the difference between life or death. Meet nature's odor-equipped inhabitants, from vomiting grasshoppers to dung-flinging hippos, and even a flower that's adapted to smell like death.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - The Road to Independence Ep4
programme.desc: As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clan’s symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkat’s alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkat’s strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Monkey Island 1 - Trouble in Paradise Ep3
programme.desc: Relaxing among the ancient temples of Sri Lanka, tufted grey langurs share their territory with a troop of toque macaques and a group of purple face leaf monkeys. This is primate paradise. But a crippling drought changes everything. The three species are forced to adapt and take risks.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Winged Weirdos Ep2
programme.desc: One uses a mustache to attract mates and another has a bill so big, it needs special vertebrae to carry it. Learn how nature's flying iconoclasts have evolved their appearance in order to survive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Into the Heat Ep1

programme.title: America's Wild Border: Northern Exposure
programme.desc: Trail Atlantic puffins, Prairie rattlesnakes, Alaskan caribou and other animals as they travel across the international boundary between the U.S. and Canada. See how they can move from safety to target by crossing a line they had no say in creating.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - The Wild Web Ep7
programme.desc: In Zambia, no single creature survives in isolation. From lions and leopards to jumping spiders and bee-eating mantises, study the diverse network of animals and plants that makes the Luangwa Valley one of the most magical wildernesses in Africa.

programme.title: Untamed Valley 1 - Hippo Lagoon Ep1
programme.desc: Secluded and sheltered, away from the hustle and bustle of Zambia’s Luangwa River, Kasikizi lagoon is home to a small community of diverse wildlife. At the height of the wet season, it’s full to the brim with water – a peaceful spot, ideal for two old male hippos who wallow in its watery depths. The lagoon is their sanctuary, a world away from the more violent life they’ve left behind at the main river, where they had to face aggressive beachmasters, willing to fight to protect their territory...

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Ugly Ep3
programme.desc: Gawk at some of the world’s ugliest animals who owe their survival to the adaptations that made them so strange. A pudgy wolf eel, naked mole rat, and hideous sea lamprey may be superficially grotesque, but they’re evolutionarily amazing.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Creepy Crawlers Ep4
programme.desc: Witness the tiny creatures that make us squirm while hiding admirable survival skills. From playing dead, removing a tail, or being able to lift objects 30 times their weight, these insects conquer the world with their amazing adaptations.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - The Berenty Dynasty Ep5
programme.desc: The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Land of Extremes Ep1
programme.desc: This episode visually illustrates how the Arctic, locked in darkness for nearly seven months, springs to life once the sun rises above the horizon. We explore ideas of migration, hibernation, the food web and habitat change, and are introduced to some of the Arctic’s most magnificent and iconic creatures and its most dramatic landscapes.

programme.title: The Big Dry 1 - The Coming of the Rains Ep3
programme.desc: The rains are late. It is the most brutal time of year. Babies born into drought face starvation. Everything is desperate for rain. When it arrives, it is a downpour on an enormous scale. Alien creatures emerge into a different world. The wet season begins.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europe’s birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Flying Fox Ep4
programme.desc: Flying out of the Australian twilight is one of the most successful mammals on the planet – the bat – and one of the most gregarious of their kind is the flying fox. With a wingspan of more than a meter, the grey headed flying fox is the largest fruit eating bat in the country.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of Mini Marsupials Ep5
programme.desc: While all marsupials share similarities, it is some of the rare smaller marsupials that highlight the fascinating contrast between them - and few small marsupials highlight these innate differences better than the quokkas and the quolls.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Identity Crisis Ep5
programme.desc: Are they guinea pigs, beavers, or something else? Capybaras embody the features of several different animals at once, as do warthogs, anteaters, and other fascinating genetic hybrids. Learn why these wannabes display such particular physical traits.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 1 - Tricksters Ep6
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is filled with mimicry, transformation, and trickery. Discover how stick bugs, lion fish, emperor scorpions, and chameleons use camouflage and confusion to deceive.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand 1 - A Tale of Two Penguins Ep1
programme.desc: At the water’s edge a brave group of male penguins gather, preparing to make the dangerous journey ashore. With many threats ahead, there is safety in number and these petite penguins have important business to attend. It’s time to breed and they must find a burrow before the females arrive.

programme.title: Arctic Secrets 1 - Devon Island - Land of Ice Ep2
programme.desc: Devon Island is the largest uninhabited island in the world. It’s so remote and forbidding that when scientists wanted to simulate living conditions on Mars, they chose Devon. Devon’s barren landscape only supports the hardiest of plants and few animals.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealand’s South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - January-February - the Year Begins Ep1
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earth’s axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Flying Fox Ep4

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - From Cloud to Coast Ep5
programme.desc: Monsoon storms sweep over the tropical island of Sri Lanka, and water carried in with swirling mists hits the mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the many changing faces of the island’s forests.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - Life on the Wing Ep6
programme.desc: Yala National Park is an avian Eden, home to 215 species of bird. This paradise offers many possibilities for parents who can weather the ever-changing climate. Every species must either raise their offspring here or find a new home before the dry season ends and the monsoon storms begin.

programme.desc: Tur-Bros / The Snailman - During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep26
programme.desc: Volcano - Ty and Revvit bravely stay behind to build and save their crater from a nearby volcano eruption, but D-Structsdoesn't want them to succeed

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep26
programme.desc: Shadows Of Bali - Odlulu uses the Shadow Puppet Key to create her own living shadows. When her mischievous shadows run off with the key, the Wanderers learn the only way to reattach the shadows is to touch them with the key. So, with the promise of a puppet show, they lure the shadows to the puppet theater, where they launch an epic game of tag to recapture the shadows before sunset

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1 Ep26
programme.desc: That Thing You Dot / Where The Streets Have No Games - When Chevron bosses around everyone in her band, Dot decide to form her own band. The Harvey Street Kids become obsessed with a new video game.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Lucky And Her New Family Part 2 - With El Circo Dos Grillos in town, memories of Milagro prompt big changes for Lucky and Jim.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Big Fun Town / New Crackridge - Archibald and Bea plan another couple's long overdue honeymoon. Is a tornado coming to Crackridge? Archibald sure seems to think so.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep26
programme.desc: Game Of Horns - At a big town festival, Magnus challenges Duggard in a competition to be chief of Huttsgalor! Can the Riders help their friend keep his helmet?
