programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep19
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Books - When Ping Pong says she is too busy to join a story reading day Raggety magically brings the books to life and they fly to Ping Pong's Pagoda, where they start to tell her their stories.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Rupert And The Mischievous Genie - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Raggety find some magical, musical stepping stones deep in the woods and unwittingly unleash a naughty young genie bent on making mischief.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep19
programme.desc: Lots Of Raa'S In The Jungle - Raa Raa and all his friends are finding out about different animals, they charge around being a pride of lions, a tower of giraffes etc… until Zebby wonders what zebras do… together the animals discover that zebras stampede… which is great fun and very noisy!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep20
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Favourite Things - Raa Raa wants to show Topsy his three favourite things. But when he gets to his friends house, they have disappeared. Raa Raa and his friends set out on a noisy adventure to find the missing objects

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep19
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Clippy Claws - Pat has a very special delivery today! Micawber's claws need clipping and Pat needs to deliver not only the claw clippers but Amy the vet too! On the way to the lighthouse though they encounter all sorts of animals needing help today – from a poorly Bonnie with a cold to a fretful Pumpkin who doesn't want to take his horse pills! Meanwhile, poor Micawber's claws are so long and he's so upset by getting them tangled up in things like Chris's scarf and the lighthouse tablecloth that he flies out of the window, carrying the tangled lighthouse keys in his claws! Chris tries to get them back and finds himself locked out of the lighthouse altogether! Luckily, Pat and Amy arrive in the SDS helicopter. Pat lowers Amy down to Micawber who is perched on top of the lighthouse and she's soon able to clip his claws and retrieve the keys. Phew! Well done Amy and well done Pat!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep20
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Sorting Machine - Pat and Jess are called to Cardiff to collect a new sorting machine when the Pencaster machine breaks down. Whilst they negotiate with Rowena Roberts, the Cardiff sorting office manager, as to how to move the heavy machine onto the SDS plane, Ben is fighting his own battles at the Pencaster office as his merry band of “helpers” from the village cause more chaos in their attempts to sort the post!After a quick tour of Gilbertson Castle, Pat and Jess manage to get the new sorting machine to Pencaster just in time to deliver a missing birthday present to Meera. Happy Birthday Meera – and well done, Postman Pat!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep71
programme.desc: Slugsy'S Song - Slugsy has found something really special. Only Primrose can be persuaded to go and see it with him. Even she is surprised by what she sees!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep72
programme.desc: Stingo'S Bridge - Webby has told Pip the story of the 3 Billy Goats Gruff. Soon a troll takes up residence under the bridge in the garden and demands food payment every time the tots cross. Can Fifi get to the bottom of the mystery?

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep19
programme.desc: The Great Beanotown Bake Off - Pieface’s all time hero, Cherry Bakewell, is coming to Beanotown to judge the annual bake-off. Pieface wants to make the best pie ever and win the competition but when Dennis discovers Pieface has never actually baked a pie before, he does everything he can to ensure a win, with pie splattering results!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Why So Clonely? - Dennis accidentally clones himself and uses clone Dennis' eagerness to help, to do all his chores and abide by the rules! All is going to plan until Walter realises what has happened and unleashes a clone cat army on the den!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep36
programme.desc: Black Site - Zarkon awakens from his coma and orders that Lotor is to be relieved of his duties, but Lotor is nowhere to be found

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep10
programme.desc: Moosebumps!: Chapter One - Eager to come face-to-face with a real life monster, Rocky and Bullwinkle buy a creepy old mansion in hopes of finding a real monster

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck'S Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep1
programme.desc: Ty And Revvit - Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chicken At Sea / The Key Master - Archibald hits the high seas to help out endangered turtles. It's Archibald to the rescue when the citizens of Crackridge report a series of thefts.

programme.title: Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants - Space Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S2 Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter The Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep27
programme.desc: Wormhole / Ear Worm - Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep1
programme.desc: Gran Day Out - When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep26
programme.desc: The Cloud / Booverty - Tip gets carried away with Boov-tech and needs Oh's post office pals to save the day; Oh must participate in a ritual dance to become an adult Boov

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit - A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Nest - When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep27
programme.desc: Why Ostrich Sticks Her Head In The Ground - You see there was a time when Ostrich was all covered in feathers and unlike all the other birds, Ostrich wasn't very good at flying at all. One night in Tinga Tinga Spider decided to make Jackal a pair of wings so that he could fly up to the moon and stop howling! Jackal and Spider stole the feathers from Ostrich's neck and legs until she looked like a very big plucked chicken! The next day Ostrich was mortified and stuck her head in the ground so that Lion couldn't see her. And it was perfect … because Ostrich looked just like a bush! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep28
programme.desc: Why Camel Has A Hump - You see there was time when Camel didn't have a hump. He lived very far away in the hot desert. But one day the desert got too hot… even for Camel. So he started walking. When Camel arrived at the Waterhole he asked the animals if he good have a drink. All the animals weren't pleased at all because the rains hadn't come and they were very thirsty. Lion allowed Camel to have one drink… but ONE drink, and ONE DRINK ONLY! Camel slurped, and he slurped, and he slurped! Until ‘POP!' a big, wobbly hump appeared on his back full of all the animals' water! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep27
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Race - Noddy is suspicious when Revs suddenly slows down during a race on the roller coaster in DareDale. He doesn't like to lose and doesn't understand what's happened. Noddy needs to investigate so that they don't lose another race! Using all his investigate skills Noddy follows the clues to the Farm where he finds out that Revs deliberately slowed down so his friend Tractor wouldn't come last as usual. Noddy realises what a great friend Revs is to Tractor. He suggests that they have another race for fun and not just to win. This time EVERYONE has fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep28
programme.desc: The Case Of The Broken Xylophone Bridge - Everyone is enjoying playing games on Toy Green but when Noddy and Big Ears come back from apple picking at the farm they discover someone, or something, has broken a key on the xylophone bridge. Noddy needs to investigate! With the help of Bumpy and Revs and using the wwwbook to gather clues, Noddy discovers that someone has tried to fix it with purple sticky tape. If he can find out who uses purple sticky tape he might discover who broke the key. The trail leads him to Smartysaurus, who broke the bridge by mistake when she was playing bowling. Noddy and Deltoid show the big dinosaur how to play the game without breaking anything else. Good job, Noddy!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep27
programme.desc: What Do We Need To Grow Beans? - Jess and the friends want to grow something for their kind friend Mimi who's always growing special things for them. They start with a bean and work out how important sunlight and water are too, by trial and error.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep28
programme.desc: Why Is Hedgehog Curled Up? - Jess is very worried about Hedgehog. He keeps curling up into a ball and Jess thinks he must need help and wants to find out how he can make his little friend feel better. Jess thinks he may need help building a little house, or that he's cold or needs a drink. But it's only when his farmyard buddies who are busy playing 'Scarey Steps' come and shout 'Scarey!' that Jess realises little HH curles up when he's frightened. Jess says goodbye and asks the children to see if they can spot a hedgehog out and about, but of course, remember to be gentle.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep1

programme.desc: Jungle Jiggles - Raa Raa wants a partner to dance a noisy stompy dance with. All the animals have their own way of dancing, apart from Zebby who says she is too shy to dance… or is she?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep22
programme.desc: Raa Raa'S Great Big Noise - Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy “moon”, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea – if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service – mission accomplished!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep73

programme.desc: The Snow Spectacular - Blaze and AJ help a truck named Snowbie get to the Snow Spectacular in time.

programme.desc: Tomás's Birthday Surprise / Family Treasure Hunt - Santiago, Lorelai and Abuelo traverse treacherous waters to bring Tomás a special birthday surprise. // It's a good ol' fashioned family competition as everyone pairs up to find the fabled treasure of La Caverna Secreta.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Super-Shark - Inspired by their favorite TV show, She-Shark, Baby Shark and William set out to be superheroes.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Ninja Season! - Gil wants to be a ninja! But his ninja teacher just keeps giving him random tasks to do. Frustrated, Gil is about to give up, when another ninja challenges him, and he realizes he's been learning ninja skills all along!

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S05 Ep513
programme.desc: Super Baby! - When supervillain Lady Goo Goo starts changing everyone into babies, it's up to Guppy Girl and Bubble Boy to stop her before they get turned into babies too!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep505
programme.desc: Naughty Tortoise - Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep506
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Shop - Peppa and George visit Mr Fox's Shop to buy Granny and Grandpa an anniversary present, but what will they choose?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Shadows - Peppa and George realize that they have shadows and no matter what they do, they can't escape from them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep508
programme.desc: International Day - Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep171
programme.desc: Bubu's New Blue Jeans - Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep172
programme.desc: Everywhere at Once - Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Little Monsters - The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Double Dare You / Roy - On a ski trip, the Barbapapas build a giant igloo. Barbabravo and Barbalib challenge each other to find out who is braver. // Barbabright creates a vacuuming robot that's also very good at soccer. The Barbababies organise a match against the robots.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep620
programme.desc: Megabot! - Blaze and AJ help their amazing new friend Megabot get to Axle City in time for the big Robot Parade

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Pups Save Apollo / Pups Save the Hippos - Apollo the Super Pup comes to Adventure Bay, in Rubble’s dream. The pups must rescue their super hero! // Raimundo’s dancing hippos shake, rattle, and roll the big top down. The Paw Patrol rebuild just in time for the big show!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Pups Save Daring Danny X / Pups in a Fix - Daring Danny X takes his ambitions too far when he attempts a jump over Rattle Snake Canyon! The Paw Patrol wows with a mid-air rescue. // RoboDog’s wiring gets mixed up, and he goes on a fixing rampage around Adventure Bay!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Rainbow Comet Rush - Can Jade and the Deer Squad help the crystal comet release its rainbow colours? Only if Jade learns to trust her friends.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Over the rainbow / We're toast - The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? // The kids are playing in the garden & make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep227
programme.desc: Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2 - The Browns take Paddington to London as a special treat for his birthday but they lose him on the way! // Paddington ends up in the Tower of London & has a close encounter with the Crown Jewels, a Beefeater and a Royal couple!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van – even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Holiday Parties! - In Holiday Land, there's a town for every holiday...that is, until Pirate Myra uses Wizard Grouper's magic wand to turn every town into Pirate Town! Will Molly and Gil be able to restore Holiday Land back to normal?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep508
programme.desc: The Gold Medal Games - It's time for the Gold Medal Games, and Blaze is ready to compete! But when Crusher cheats and sends his rival flying far away, Blaze has to speed back to Axle City to beat the buzzer and win that medal!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Stones of Power - When Santiago and his crew race to protect the magical Stones of Power from being taken by Bonnie Bones, they discover more than they bargained for. Luckily, they receive a little help from their hero -- Capitán Calavera!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp. // The pups must help salmon get to the ocean and also need to rescue Alex who gets stuck on top of a dam.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Paddington and The Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Sandpit - Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep609
programme.desc: Night Animals - It's night time at Grandpa and Granny Pig's house, and Peppa and George have stayed up late to help hunt for slugs and snails.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep614
programme.desc: Mirrors - George has fun looking at himself in the mirror. Peppa and George try to find other shiny things to see themselves in.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep86
programme.desc: This Way, That Way - The Teletubbies go 'this way, that way' on a Tubby Car journey to the Hidey Hup. The Tubby Spinny goes 'this way, that way' too.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep11
programme.desc: Train - Dee encourages a friend to say 'train' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a fast train, a slow train, an animal train and even meet a super train!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep46
programme.desc: Puppy Snuggle Time - A puppy sleepover in Doug-Po's room proves problematic when the puppies keep falling out of bed.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: It's Time to Visit the Art Gallery - JoJo and Gran Gran visit the art gallery and join a tour with curator Marie to see lots of different types of art. JoJo realises art isn't just for looking at - it's for making too!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep73
programme.desc: Monty Rides Again - Monty is nervous about trying skateboarding and begins wondering why some people just seem to have courage and others don't.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep72
programme.desc: My Family - Monty is teased by a school friend for having a strange family and begins to wish the Kazoops were more like everyone else.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep23
programme.desc: Shops - Playing 'Shops' is the best game ever for Bluey and her friends - if they can ever get started! With Bluey questioning the rules and changing who's who, they might be here all day!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep52
programme.desc: The Walking Badge - The Squirrels learn the many ways you can walk with the help of friends and a catchy song.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep51
programme.desc: The Action Hero Badge - The Squirrels learn about an action hero called Jet Rocket who always saves the day by smashing and crashing things. But there are other ways to save the day!

programme.desc: The What Happened Badge - The Squirrels try and tell us what has just happened but are struggling to retell the story correctly.

programme.desc: Andy and the Grasshopper Mouse - Andy heads to America and embarks on an epic adventure with a tiny grasshopper mouse.

programme.desc: Sr. 33 - Martha realises what Alf is fishing for. Logan discovers who is more stubborn Dean or Mackenzie. Tori and Christian discover if mixing wine and wedding shopping is a good idea.

programme.title: First On The Ground
programme.desc: Australian peacekeepers have been in the field every year since 1947, when they were the first on the ground in the Netherlands East Indies. They serve with the aim of contributing to lasting peace around the world.

programme.desc: Paul Barry turns the spotlight onto those who 'make the news': the reporters, online editors, producers, camera operators and photographers, plus PR consultants, media agencies, spin-doctors, lobbyists and social influencers.

programme.title: The Drum Ep203

programme.title: Document 72 Hours
programme.desc: The huge underground parking lot at Tokyo's Kasai Station can hold about 10,000 bicycles. For three days, we asked commuters using the facility about where they were going - and why.

programme.title: Doctor'S Insight
programme.desc: Japan is a pioneer in endoscopy as 90% of colonoscopes used worldwide are made in Japan. How easy is it to get screened now? Find out about endoscopic improvements and the latest system using AI.

programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Shinpuku Yoko was recognized by the World Health Organization on its 2020 list of "100 Outstanding Women Nurse and Midwife Leaders." She talks about her work to improve maternal health in Tanzania.

programme.title: Journeys In Japan
programme.desc: Actor Jonathan Senior travels north to Iwate and a remote hamlet where the pages of the Legends of Tono, a collection of folktales from the area, come to life.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep5
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep11
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rodriguez vs. Lemos
programme.desc: Prelims - Strawweights intent on making their case for a world title shot in 2023 collide at the APEX in Las Vegas, as Top Five contender Marina Rodriguez battles fellow Brazilian standout Amanda Lemos in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in her last five, Rodriguez’ bonus-winning victories over Amanda Ribas and Mackenzie Dern have made her a fan favorite heading into her showdown with Lemos, who is coming off a Performance of the Night submission win over Michelle Waterson in July. Plus, top-flight welterweights square off in the co-main event, with Neil Magny taking on Daniel Rodriguez.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rodriguez vs. Lemos
programme.desc: Main Event - Strawweights intent on making their case for a world title shot in 2023 collide at the APEX in Las Vegas, as Top Five contender Marina Rodriguez battles fellow Brazilian standout Amanda Lemos in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in her last five, Rodriguez’ bonus-winning victories over Amanda Ribas and Mackenzie Dern have made her a fan favorite heading into her showdown with Lemos, who is coming off a Performance of the Night submission win over Michelle Waterson in July. Plus, top-flight welterweights square off in the co-main event, with Neil Magny taking on Daniel Rodriguez.
